segments.text: I see the sink area dominated by the overflowing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, expression blank to the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how the water damages the cabinets unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping in the puddle without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes on the counter wait their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the left side with the open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, reaching deep into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The instability of that stool makes me nauseous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl below, arm outstretched in eager wait.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their sneaky cookie heist brings a smile despite the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The divided window panes show the tidy yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Plants and path look perfectly maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight contrasts the indoor hazards sharply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away from the potential accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
